# Serve Funding

> Serve Funding is a boutique business financing advisory providing transparent alternative financing
> including asset-based lending, invoice factoring, working capital loans, equipment leasing,
> PO funding, debt refinancing, and MCA consolidation for businesses seeking $250K-$100MM.
> Channel-neutral advisor with 30+ lender relationships. Atlanta-based, nationwide service.

## Website
- https://servefunding.com: Main site

## Key Pages
- https://servefunding.com/solutions: All funding solutions overview and comparison
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/working-capital-loans: Working Capital Loans & Lines of Credit
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/invoice-factoring: Invoice Financing (AR Factoring)
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/asset-based-lending: Asset-Based Lending
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/equipment-leasing: Equipment Leasing & Financing
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/purchase-order-funding: PO Funding
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/government-contracts: Government Contract Financing
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/real-estate-lending: Real Estate Lending
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/unsecured-debt: Subordinated & Unsecured Credit
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/bridge-funding: Bridge Funding
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/sba-loans: SBA Loans
- https://servefunding.com/solutions/debt-refinance: Consolidation & Recapitalization
- https://servefunding.com/faq: Comprehensive FAQ organized by funding type
- https://servefunding.com/blog: Educational articles on business financing
- https://servefunding.com/about-us: Company information and founder story
- https://servefunding.com/partners: Partner and referral information
- https://servefunding.com/contact-us: Contact and consultation scheduling

## Solution Categories
- Working Capital: Revenue-based loans, lines of credit ($100K-$10M+, 2-10 day funding)
- Invoice Factoring: AR financing, sell unpaid invoices ($250K-$100MM, Prime + 1-6%)
- Asset-Based Lending: Credit lines backed by AR, inventory, equipment ($250K-$25M)
- Equipment Financing: Leasing and financing for machinery, vehicles, technology ($100K-$50M+)
- PO Funding: Purchase order financing for manufacturers and importers ($250K-$50M)
- Government Contracts: Federal, state, local contract financing ($250K-$50M+)
- Real Estate: Bridge loans, commercial financing, cash-out refinance ($500K-$100M+)
- Bridge Capital: Short-term unsecured financing for timing gaps ($50K-$5M+)
- SBA Loans: Government-backed loans with lower rates ($250K-$5M+)
- Debt Refinance: MCA consolidation, payment reduction, recapitalization ($250K-$10M+)

## About
Serve Funding is a channel-neutral working capital advisory founded in 2021 in Atlanta, GA.
Led by Michael Kodinsky with 15+ years in commercial lending. The company connects businesses
with 30+ alternative lenders when traditional banks decline. Success-fee model (1-2% of funded
amount, paid only at closing). Core values: Transparency, Responsibility, Understanding,
Service, Thankfulness (T.R.U.S.T.). Serves manufacturing, construction, staffing, healthcare,
CPG, e-commerce, government contractors, and professional services nationwide.
